forge

# Text Fragment
They will forge a stronger alliance

{"word_translation":"schmieden","fragment_translation":"Nach Monaten der Gespräche werden sie ein stärkeres Bündnis schmieden"}

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
German

# Target Word
ripple

# Dictionary Definition
Verb: to form small waves or undulations

# Text Fragment
The wind made small waves ripple across the lake

# Paragraph Context
The evening was perfectly calm. <fragment>The wind made small waves <target>ripple</target> across the lake.</fragment> A few ducks drifted near the shore.
{"word_translation":"kräuseln","fragment_translation":"Der Wind ließ kleine Wellen über den See kräuseln"}
